body_html:
Same cluster of issues.
Renaming wheel does not help.

tensorflow_gpu-0.12.1-cp36-cp35m-win_amd64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.

Windows 10
GPU TF
Python 3.6.0 | Anaconda 4.3.0 (64-bit)

TF installed and ran the basic test code
...Then after CUDA install it failed
Tried putting C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\bin in path as suggested here:
#6235

(I was previously working on Mac CPU TF 0.1, install was simpler!)

body:
Same cluster of issues.
Renaming wheel does not help.

`tensorflow_gpu-0.12.1-cp36-cp35m-win_amd64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.`

Windows 10 
GPU TF
Python 3.6.0 | Anaconda 4.3.0 (64-bit)


TF installed and ran the basic test code
...Then after CUDA install it failed
Tried putting C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\bin in path as suggested here: 
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/6235

(I was previously working on Mac CPU TF 0.1, install was simpler!)
